Review this pull request for the gws Google Workspace CLI project (Go, Cobra/Viper).

Check for:
- Correctness: API usage, error handling, edge cases
- Pattern consistency with existing cmd/*.go files
- Test coverage: httptest mocking, command structure tests
- Security: no credential leaks, proper input validation
- Code quality: naming, formatting, idiomatic Go

Reference CLAUDE.md for project conventions.

Provide a summary with: what changed, what looks good, and any issues found.
Rate severity of issues as: Critical, Warning, or Suggestion.
